ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) package individually wrapped caramels, unwrapped

cookingTips: Wash and dry apples thoroughly, then rub with vinegar to remove waxy coating for better caramel adhesion
Keep caramel warm but not hot for easy coating
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the caramel coating process, emphasizing proper apple preparation and how to achieve an even, thick caramel coating.
